TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AsyncOperation extends System.Object

summary.span: 跟踪异步操作的生存期。

span.span: Tracks the lifetime of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据 [基于事件的异步模式概述](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview)实现类时，可能需要跟踪在类的实例上调用的每个异步操作的生存期。When you implement a class according to the [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview), you may need to track the lifetime of each asynchronous operation invoked on an instance of your class. 类提供了一种方法来跟踪和报告异步任务的进度。The class provides ways to track and report the progress of an asynchronous task. 下表列出了使用对象的方法 ：The following list identifies ways to use an object: - 若要向客户端报告进度和中间结果，请 从异步辅助代码调用。To report progress and interim results to the client, call from your asynchronous worker code. - 若要指示异步任务已完成，或者若要取消挂起的异步任务，请调用 。To indicate that an asynchronous task has completed, or to cancel a pending asynchronous task, call . 类应 在每个任务启动时通过调用来获取每个异步任务的对象。Your class should get an object for each asynchronous task by calling when each task starts. 若要允许客户端区分不同的异步任务，请将 参数用于客户端提供的唯一令牌，该令牌将成为 属性。To allow the client to distinguish separate asynchronous tasks, takes a parameter for a unique client-provided token, which becomes the property. 然后，客户端代码可以使用它来标识引发进度或完成事件的特定异步任务。It can then be used by client code to identify the particular asynchronous task that is raising progress or completion events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using an object to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅 [如何：实现支持基于事件的异步模式的组件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c1aa4d4-da87-4a03-b812-3d167b8c57cf)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Component That Supports the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c1aa4d4-da87-4a03-b812-3d167b8c57cf). 有关客户端窗体的完整代码列表，请参阅 [如何：实现基于事件的异步模式的客户端](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/how-to-implement-a-client-of-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern)。For a full code listing of a client form, see [How to: Implement a Client of the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/how-to-implement-a-client-of-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#3)]

para.span: 实现程序必须确保 和 调用是异步的，因此，如果类库提供程序在发生同步的特定应用程序模型中采用异步行为，则类库提供程序无需考虑潜在的堆栈溢出。

span.span: Implementers must ensure the and invocations are asynchronous, so that class library providers do not need to concern themselves with potential stack overflows if they assume asynchronous behavior in a particular application model that happens to be synchronous.

para.span: 有关实现异步类的详细信息，请参阅 [实现基于事件的异步模式](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern)。

span.span: For more information about implementing asynchronous classes, see [Implementing the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern).

span.span: Finalizes the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 结束异步操作的生存期。

span.span: Ends the lifetime of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法以结束异步操作的生存期。Call the method to end the lifetime of an asynchronous operation. 针对特定任务调用此方法后，对其对应的调用 将引发异常。After this method is called for a particular task, calls to its corresponding will raise an exception.

exception.span: 此前便已为此任务调用了 。

span.span: has been called previously for this task.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Post (System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object arg);
.method public hidebysig instance void Post(class System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object arg) cil managed
Public Sub Post (d As SendOrPostCallback, arg As Object)
public void Post (System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object? arg);

param.name: d
param.span: 一个用于包装操作结束时要调用的委托的 对象。

span.span: A object that wraps the delegate to be called when the operation ends.

param.name: arg
param.span: 参数中包含的委托的一个自变量。

span.span: An argument for the delegate contained in the parameter.

summary.span: 在适合于应用程序模型的线程或上下文中调用委托。

span.span: Invokes a delegate on the thread or context appropriate for the application model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用参数指定的委托， `arg` 而不会结束异步操作的生存期。The method invokes the delegate specified by the `arg` parameter without ending the lifetime of the asynchronous operation. 您可以按 所需的频率调用方法，但异步操作的生存期尚未通过调用结束 。You can call the method as often as you like while the lifetime of the asynchronous operation has not been ended by a call to . 您可以使用方法将进度或临时结果报告回客户端。You can use the method to report progress or interim results back to clients. `d`如果要发布有关异步任务状态的更新，则参数将包装你要调用的委托。The `d` parameter wraps the delegate you want called when you want to post an update about the status of the asynchronous task. 对象将确保在适用于应用程序模型的线程或上下文中调用委托。The object will ensure that your delegate is invoked on the thread or context appropriate for the application model. 你的方法可以选择引发事件，以通知客户端状态更改、进度更新或新提供的增量结果。Your method can optionally raise an event that notifies clients of a status change, progress update, or newly available incremental results. `arg`应使用参数将状态传递给由参数包装的委托 `d` 。The `arg` parameter should be used to pass state to the delegate wrapped by the `d` parameter. 它可能是对的引用 ，也可能是 对象。It might be a reference to an , or it might be a object. 可能需要从派生您自己的类 来提供附加的状态存储。It may be desirable to derive your own class from to provide additional state storage. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法报告异步操作的进度和增量结果。The following code example demonstrates using the method for reporting progress and incremental results of an asynchronous operation. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#5)]

exception.span: 此前便已为此任务调用了 方法。

span.span: The method has been called previously for this task.
is .

para.span: 继承者必须使 调用异步，以便类库提供程序在假定异步但特定应用程序模型发生同步时，无需考虑潜在的堆栈溢出。

span.span: Inheritors must make the invocation asynchronous, so that class library providers do not need to concern themselves with potential stack overflows if they assume asynchrony but a particular application model happens to be synchronous.

para.span: 控制台应用程序不会同步 调用的执行。

span.span: Console applications do not synchronize the execution of calls.

para.span: 这会导致按错误的顺序引发 事件。

span.span: This can cause events to be raised out of order.

para.span: 如果希望序列化 调用的执行，请实现并安装 类。

span.span: If you wish to have serialized execution of calls, implement and install a class.

para.span: 有关实现异步类的详细信息，请参阅 [实现基于事件的异步模式](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern)。

span.span: For more information about implementing asynchronous classes, see [Implementing the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern).

Public Sub PostOperationCompleted (d As SendOrPostCallback, arg As Object)
public void PostOperationCompleted (System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object? arg);

param.name: d
param.span: 一个用于包装操作结束时要调用的委托的 对象。

span.span: A object that wraps the delegate to be called when the operation ends.

param.name: arg
param.span: 参数中包含的委托的一个自变量。

span.span: An argument for the delegate contained in the parameter.

summary.span: 结束异步操作的生存期。

span.span: Ends the lifetime of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法以结束异步操作的生存期。Call the method to end the lifetime of an asynchronous operation. 对特定任务调用此方法后，对其相应对象的调用 将引发异常。After this method is called for a particular task, calls to its corresponding object will raise an exception. `d`当任务的生存期由于任务完成、取消或失败而结束时，参数会包装你希望类调用的委托。The `d` parameter wraps the delegate you want your class to call when the task's lifetime ends due to completion, cancellation, or failure of the task. 对象将确保在适用于应用程序模型的线程或上下文中调用委托。The object will ensure that your delegate is invoked on the thread or context appropriate for the application model. 委托可以选择引发事件，以通知客户端异步任务的生存期已结束。Your delegate can optionally raise an event that notifies clients that the asynchronous task's lifetime has ended. `arg`参数用于将状态信息传递给完成委托 `d` 。The `arg` parameter is used to pass state information to the completion delegate `d`. 可以使用 对象或 对象作为参数值。You can use an object, or an object as the parameter value. 或者，如果要提供附加状态存储，可以使用从类派生的类的实例 。Alternatively, if you want to provide additional state storage, you can use an instance of a class you derive from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法结束异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using the method to end the lifetime of an asynchronous operation. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#4)]

exception.span: 此前便已为此任务调用了 。

span.span: has been called previously for this task.
is .

para.span: 继承者必须使 调用异步，以便类库提供程序在假定异步但特定应用程序模型发生同步时，无需考虑潜在的堆栈溢出。

span.span: Inheritors must make the invocation asynchronous, so that class library providers do not need to concern themselves with potential stack overflows if they assume asynchrony but a particular application model happens to be synchronous.

para.span: 方法应解释为 "结束生存期" 调用，这意味着实现需要执行适用于应用程序模型的操作。

span.span: The method should be interpreted as an "ending the lifetime" call, meaning the implementation needs to do what is appropriate for the application model.

para.span: 例如，ASP.NET 将减少未完成的异步操作的计数。

span.span: For instance, ASP.NET will decrement its count of outstanding asynchronous operations.

para.span: 这还应将操作置于状态，以便对其进行的任何后续调用都将失败，因为它现在已完成。

span.span: This also should put the operation into a state such that any subsequent calls into it will fail, since it has now completed.

para.span: 有关实现异步类的详细信息，请参阅 [实现基于事件的异步模式](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern)。

span.span: For more information about implementing asynchronous classes, see [Implementing the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern).

summary.span: 获取或设置用于唯一标识异步操作的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets an object used to uniquely identify an asynchronous operation.

value.span: 传递给异步方法调用的状态对象。

span.span: The state object passed to the asynchronous method invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类支持多个异步方法或多次调用单个异步方法，客户端将需要一种方法来确定引发事件的异步任务。If your class supports multiple asynchronous methods or multiple invocations of a single asynchronous method, clients will need a way to determine which asynchronous task is raising events. `MethodNameAsync`方法应采用类型为的参数 ，该参数将充当任务 ID。Your `MethodNameAsync` method should take a parameter of type that will act as a task ID. 调用、方法时将使用此任务 ID， 这会将客户端的任务 id 与特定的异步操作调用相关联。You will use this task ID when you call the , method and this will associate the client's task ID with a particular invocation of your asynchronous operation. 此任务 ID 通过属性可用于实现 。This task ID is made available to your implementation through the property. > [!CAUTION] > 若要为属性提供唯一值，客户端代码必须小心 。Client code must be careful to provide a unique value for the property. 不唯一的任务 Id 可能会导致实现不正确地报告进度和其他事件。Non-unique task IDs may cause your implementation to report progress and other events incorrectly. 你的代码应检查非唯一的任务 ID， 如果检测到，则引发。Your code should check for a non-unique task ID and raise an if one is detected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 如何使用跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#4)]
